biotools.summary: Tool to assemble genes using network matching algorithm. Given an already-assembled dataset, it is capable of assembling contigs together to form more complete genes with the help of a reference gene set. Currently the assembly software that is supported SOAPdenovo.

bioschemas.name: GeneStitch
bioschemas.summary: Tool to assemble genes using network matching algorithm. Given an already-assembled dataset, it is capable of assembling contigs together to form more complete genes with the help of a reference gene set. Currently the assembly software that is supported SOAPdenovo.
